scripts.build: babel src/main.js | uglifyjs -o dist/jspdf.plugin.autotable.js --comments && babel src/main.js > dist/jspdf.plugin.autotable.src.js && node build updateVersion
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
scripts.hosted: git checkout gh-pages && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "Updated to latest version" && git push
scripts.deploy: git push && git push --tags && npm publish && npm run hosted
